idare.metanode.internal.Data.itemizedData

Class AbstractItemContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • idare.metanode.internal.Data.itemizedData.AbstractItemContainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataContainer

    public abstract class AbstractItemContainer
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataContainer
    A Basis class for container using itemized data. providing some functionality common to any item based data.
    Author:
    Thomas Pfau

    • Method Detail

      • getMinimalSize

        public java.awt.Rectangle getMinimalSize()
        Description copied from interface: DataContainer
        A container should provide information on its size This dimension is assumed to simultaneously represent the number of items (i.e. Dimension.x * Dimension.y = Number of items The maximal dimension allowed for a non flexible container is 10*10 in the center and 10*6 in the edges For a flexible container it is assumed, that the container can be rescaled and thus a maximal item count of 100 is allowed for center and 60 for edge containers
        Specified by:
        getMinimalSize in interface DataContainer
        Returns:
        the minimal Size of this container (in units)

      • getLocalisationPreference

        public Localisation getLocalisationPreference()
        Description copied from interface: DataContainer
        Get the localisation preferences for this container (i.e whether to be placed on the EDGE, or in the CENTER, See Localisation.Position, and whether it is a flexible container or not).
        Specified by:
        getLocalisationPreference in interface DataContainer
        Returns:
        the preferred Localisation of this Container

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
